website_summaries.verdict: Hand rails can be very useful additions to raised toilet seats, and this model is very stable and lightweight.
pros: Includes side hand rails for increased stability
cons: Does not fit some round toilet bowl designs
Not ideal for larger or male users

customer_reviews.title: Universal Fit???? I don't think so........
customer_reviews.text: Thanks for both the continued pain after believing the hype and buying a best seller highly rated product that should have worked fine after a total knee replacement and the frustration of trying to make it work on three different standard oval seats (Bemis, KOHLER, and Church). Product description read: It is a universal fit for standard, round, elevated, and compact toilets as well as Elsewhere in the web page you can find this: Please note that the product is designed for only certain models of toilet seats. You can't have it both ways. Amend your descriptions to match the product. I will amend my review after that happens.
customer_reviews.author: J. ANDERSON

customer_reviews.title: Good elevated option, seat is tippy if you grab onto just one side of the handles
customer_reviews.text: Good option for just a raised toilet seat but with the handles it was a little unsafe for my 86 year old mother who is recovering from a broken pelvis and needed something to hold onto to boost her up as well. The locking mechanism just does not stay in place if you put weight on one or the other handle and it will flip off. In the end we just removed the handles as she can use the bathroom grab bars and the elevation of the seat is still quite helpful. To note, if you do hold onto both handles evenly it is quite stable, we just couldn't rely on her remembering to always do that.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: May not work for you
customer_reviews.text: If you are buying this for an elderly relative, as we were, be aware that it adds a good four inches to the toilet height so if your loved one is vertically challenged, their feet may not be flat on the floor. Secondly, it does not attach securely to all toilets. We installed it on my MIL's toilet - easy to do - and we thought it was flush (excuse the expression) but because this particular style of bowl was curved at the top, the riser started to slide right away, which is dangerous. We keep it at our home for visits - it does work on our toilet. YOU CANNOT RETURN by the way. Understandably.
customer_reviews.author: Macguff

customer_reviews.title: Not Stable!
customer_reviews.text: Not stable, even tough toilet meets size criteria! Be sure you test this seat for stability within the return period of 30 days (no flexibility on returns). We bought for my mom who just had hip surgery. Unfortunately, her May surgery was delayed by a month. Even though the instructions give dimensions of toilets it should fit, this does not guarantee that it will be stable. If you want to ensure stability (no rocking), buy one that has a frame that independently creates a platform on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: MRM

customer_reviews.title: Poor design and no instructions
customer_reviews.text: Poor design and assembly; no instructions provided. Once handles are placed on the seat, it's impossible to remove them or change their position. There is NO access to release the buttons that lock the handles in place. The picture provided is NOT accurate. There is no opening to allow access, as it is pictured. It's just solid plastic all the way around. So once handles are in place, you're stuck. Maybe the one sent me was a factory defect, but it did not resemble the product as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: HTC

customer_reviews.title: Repeat performance!
customer_reviews.text: I had a hip replacement 4 years ago & bought this item to help me during my recovery. I am 5'10" & liked the raised height so well I kept using it. I'm facing another replacement & decided to tetire my old one. It's comfortable, easy to clean & the handles are a huge help in sitting & standing. Sets up in 2 minutes, no problem. This is a great product!
customer_reviews.author: KU Jayhawk

customer_reviews.title: It is sturdy and it doesn't move at all
customer_reviews.text: I had hip surgery on 7 16 18 so I had to get a raised toilet seat. It is sturdy and it doesn't move at all....very pleased with this 5inch lift. My handyman installed it for me so I am very happy with it. I am happy with everything I get on this website. I have ordered so many items from Amazon. This is where I shop now. Delivery is faster than the PO.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth H Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Highly disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Not designed for a man to use. Did not work as I had hoped it would. Used it to assist with my hip replacement recovery and was very disappointed. I give it two stars for having a good build quality. It should work for a woman weighing less than 140 lbs or is slim in the hip.
customer_reviews.author: Eric K

customer_reviews.title: If buying for use after hip replacement...
customer_reviews.text: The product is as advertised and seems made well enough. It is easy to attach and fits on an elongated bowl. I found that a commode that fits over the toilet to be much easier to use, more stable and comfortable than the seat riser. The commode height was adjustable and was very easy to sit on and get up from when having only limited weight allowed on 1 leg.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Relief
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with my raised toilet seat. I had knee replacement surgery two weeks ago and it is very painful to sit down on a low seat and painful to get back up. Vaunn raised toilet seat is a life saver. I’m thinking of leaving it on even after my knee is healed. Only two small complaints...the lock doesn’t stay tight, and it’s tricky to wipe because the opening seems small. I’ve learned to work with it and it’s worth it. I would recommend it to anyone with knee problems.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen O

customer_reviews.title: Not much assembly, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Had a hip replacement so the use of this has been so helpful, the only issue I had was when installing one of the rails, getting the notches to click (on one side) was a challenge
customer_reviews.author: Randee L. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Not for elongated toilet.
customer_reviews.text: Nice product overall, but as the description says, it does not work on an elongated toilet. We did not read the description closely enough, and sure enough, the item is not very secure on an elongated toilet.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Buckwalter

customer_reviews.title: Easily installed
customer_reviews.text: I liked that the product was simple to install and that no tools were required. The installation instructions were easy to follow and included safety warnings for use of the product.
customer_reviews.author: BebeR

customer_reviews.title: Almost ready to use upon delivery and unwrapping.
customer_reviews.text: It arrived sooner than predicted, which was nice. There was no problem in attaching the grab bars. It is easy to secure onto the toilet and easy to remove for cleaning. The molded seat is very comfortable -- and not cold, like porcelain is!
customer_reviews.author: Occasional shopper

customer_reviews.title: because of a hip replacement it was not recommended to go 90 degrees or less so this seat ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't know if I would need this but safety first, because of a hip replacement it was not recommended to go 90 degrees or less so this seat helped for at least the first week.
customer_reviews.author: Keith G. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Mounting is not too sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Returned it. Kinda cheesy. Better to get one with legs. I can’t say it’s the products fault. It is what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Maybe okay for a child or petite adult...
customer_reviews.text: The round opening is way too small for an adult. I truly wasted my money in buying this product. I had to throw it into the trash and replace it with one made to be suitable for adults.
customer_reviews.author: ConchRepublic

customer_reviews.title: Seat wobbles from side to side
customer_reviews.text: The rear flange is not deep enough to secure a good fit on our toilet seat; in fact, I'd hardly call it a flange at all. The picture in the installation instructions does not match our product. I followed installation instructions exactly. We are unable to use this product and have wasted our money buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn E Peacock

customer_reviews.title: Defective and dangerous
customer_reviews.text: This raised toilet seat did not fit my toilet ....make sure that it locks and does not turn. I called the company and they were wonderful! They refunded my money graciously !!
customer_reviews.author: Daryl H

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for postoperative needs
customer_reviews.text: I needed this seat because I had rather complicated spine surgery and couldn’t use our low commode. Very easy to install. Comfortable and stable. According to customer service safe to clean with Clorox bathroom cleaner or wipes. I was a little unsure how to measure the commode to be sure this would fit before I ordered it. Customer service of this company is great!
customer_reviews.author: maggie

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Raised Stool Seat
customer_reviews.text: This works perfect for our stool. It raises it just enough, was easy to install & very sturdy. I would recommend it to someone needing a higher stool.
customer_reviews.author: lakewoman

customer_reviews.title: Good seat height! Solid product. Easy to Install.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Just make sure you tighten very tight prior to use otherwise the seat might shift on you. I had foot surgery and this product helped me with sitting and getting up from the commode easier. I like the solid handles. I would have given this a five star rating but found that you have to wipe down the inside with a clorax after each use because sometimes urine does splash on it.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Great all around
customer_reviews.text: Great all around ! Helps me to get up and down. Directions are clear and no hassle to clean this product. Thank you ! Sincerely, Pam Cota
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy install but not male-friendly
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, super-easy to put onto the toilet without having to remove existing seat. But this product is not designed for the male anatomy, since the opening is too short from front to back. My husband found the handles very sturdy and supportive, but sadly he could not sit comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: nancy h

customer_reviews.title: If they can sit unassisted it works great
customer_reviews.text: Used for my dad it worked great although even following the instructiins if someone does not even distribute their weight while going to sit on it it may shift so becarful.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Mattson

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver for anyone recovering from back/hip surgeries!
customer_reviews.text: Super helpful for anyone who has difficulty getting up and down: like back surgeries. Simple to install, and bars are secure.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful
customer_reviews.text: I did not do the install but the home worker had no difficulties. Seems to work great, I'm a little apprehensive about keeping it clean.
customer_reviews.author: mowgli

customer_reviews.title: Great elevated toilet seat
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my short 92 year old mother and she loves it...it works very well and is super easy to install & uninstall.
customer_reviews.author: Penni KnappTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Install and perfect
customer_reviews.text: After hip surgery this was the perfect and necessary product: easy to install and stayed secure.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: got it for my roommate who has knee and back issues - weakness - she loves it! easy to get up now and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: crnurse

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Have multiple spinal fractures.Your quality product has made my life easier. Well constructed,easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Handles, comfort and safe
customer_reviews.text: My husband had hip surgery and needed to make the toilet higher, this was incredible easy to install, very comfortable to sit on and a good price. The handles on the side are an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: zon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install. Attaches securely with E Z lock.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Both elevates and helps getting up.
customer_reviews.text: The seat is exactly as described. After recent foot surgery I needed something to both elevate me AND provide handholds that assist me in getting upright to a standing position. It satisfies both requirements perfectly. I am 5'4" and weigh 165 lbs. It supports me without incident.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Guerin

customer_reviews.title: Will not fit all toilet bowls.
customer_reviews.text: Would not fit my toilets properly. The product specifications do not specify that the internal rim of the bowl must be 1 3/4”. Mine are wider. This is a warning. It will sit on toilet rim, but is not secure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Much easier to use
customer_reviews.text: I already had a portable raised toilet seat without handles and prefer this new one by far. It is so much easier to get up with the use of the handles.
customer_reviews.author: JMNE

customer_reviews.title: Very dangerous. Seem to fit the toilet seat I ...
customer_reviews.text: Very dangerous. Seem to fit the toilet seat I have but if I place my190 lb weight on one side, it tips over to that side. The locking mechanism does not seem to work well for my toilet at least.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It wobbles
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my husband after his hip fracture. It got only 4 stars bc it wobbles if one doesn’t sit down exactly straight. It really needs side attachments not just the front one to hold it tight on the toilet.
customer_reviews.author: sand flea

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy install and stays put. A little high but truly helps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best product ever
customer_reviews.text: After having a full knee replacement this elevated seat makes things a lot easier. Installs in seconds, fits really well, solid construction and sturdy handrails. I recommend this to anyone that has limited knee movement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Total knee replacement - you need this!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I ordered it. Total knee replacement is hard enough.This makes it much easier!
customer_reviews.author: Linda C. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Nice product but did not fit our toilet.
customer_reviews.text: Nice product but did not fit our toilet. We have a round 15'5 " toilet & the device would not stay secured making it dangerous to use for an older person with limited mobility.
customer_reviews.author: Chris C

customer_reviews.title: super easy to attach
customer_reviews.text: Fits the toilet well, super easy to attach, supports the weight. Handles were very easy to install and the seat fits and functions well. If you have problems with this product, you're probably a moron.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Did not like used for tolieting hole to small and keep hitting my leg on knob in front when turning to use item not comfortable either very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: paulette feldman

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: This did not lock down on the toilet and would be a definite hazard to an elderly person. If you put weight on one handle it would fall off of the toilet.
customer_reviews.author: Beagle mama

customer_reviews.title: This seat is perfect. Suffered ruptured brain aneurysm and I’m partially paralyzed( ...
customer_reviews.text: This seat is perfect. Suffered ruptured brain aneurysm and I’m partially paralyzed( left side). It’s precisely what I needed. Very sturdy durable and easy to transport.
customer_reviews.author: Ramona Foster

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my elderly father
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my elderly father. Easy installation. Good quality. I expected it to be slightly wobbly but to my surprise it was very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The seat provides support, especially the arms that allow ...
customer_reviews.text: The seat provides support, especially the arms that allow one to raise oneself up. The only drawback is that it moves because of the elongated shape of the toilet.
customer_reviews.author: Flower

customer_reviews.title: SUPERIOR PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS AN EXCELLENT PRODUCT! IT IS STURDY AND SIMPLE TO PUT TOGETHER WITHOUT ANY TOOLS. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND IT.
customer_reviews.author: Take It for Granite

customer_reviews.title: Fits oval commodes
customer_reviews.text: Fits well, is very sturdy, easy to remove for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn S.

customer_reviews.title: seemed like good quality construction
customer_reviews.text: didn't fit very solid on our particular toilet. seemed like good quality construction.
customer_reviews.author: rick morris

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Wife had hip replaced, this worked fantastic! Very happy with product.
customer_reviews.author: John Waite

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great, helps my elder mother a lot. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No tools needed!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Sturdy. Works well. Fits perfectly. No issues.
customer_reviews.author: Marie BK

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was searching for 🚽🚻🚾
customer_reviews.text: Strong, sturdy and perfect height. I do an extra tightening each time I sit on this seat just to make certain it's tight. Hard plastic doesn't crush. Helpful hint, when you're ready to flush your waste, lay strips of toilet paper across the entire opening to prevent bacteria and getting from landing on everything which leads to sickness. If you've animals, keep door closed because there's no way to cover this with toilet seat lid.
customer_reviews.author: Incubus-Nihilist

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't firmly attach to toilet.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my old one which was looking "old". This one does not lock firmly on toilet. It slips from side to side. If I get up and lean on one arm rest it will just tip right off. At first it seemed to hold but as time went on it was constantly slipping. This morning I almost fell and decided to get another brand. My old one (I forget the brand) never moved around. I do take it off to clean them occasionally and when I try to reattach it the front attachment just doesn't hold so off it tips. I've only had it a couple of months and decided I'd rather replace it than fall.
customer_reviews.author: Sandee

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it for my aging mother. It is easy to install. Yes, the handles do move a little, but not to the point of compromising safety or comfort. I suggest to check the tightening before every use, which is easy to do since it is easy access and located at the front. The tightening mechanism loosens up overtime and will not keep the seat as tightly fasten as before. So just make sure that it is well positioned before each use. It did make life easier for my mom and a few of us around.
customer_reviews.author: super mom

customer_reviews.title: Working well for me after surgery
customer_reviews.text: It is comfortable and working for what we need now. I had ACL Reconstruction surgery and it was hard to get too low on the toilet. I haven’t had it slip or anything. My mom had one after leg surgery and it was scary. So we were afraid to get this for my surgery recovery. We were happy to see how sturdy it is after a few weeks. We removed one handlebar to make it easier on me, since that was my surgical leg with brace/bandage etc. The handle came off easy by pushing a button.
customer_reviews.author: Katie B

customer_reviews.title: Useless to us
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband to use after total knee replacement surgery. He is 57 yrs old, 5’11”, 270 lbs. I bought it because it’s supposed to be a universal toilet fit and ease of installment. But, Ir wobbles on our standard toilet. He’s overweight but he could still fit on the seat but his “personal bits” didn’t hang over the opening and it was uncomfortable so it’s useless. Maybe smaller people will have more luck with it, assuming it doesn’t wobble on their toilet when lowering themselves onto the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Hindsight

customer_reviews.title: This product is not for older males. The opening ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is not for older males. The opening is not long enough for male urine direction. I must return. Well made product but not for old me.
customer_reviews.author: M. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: No tools needs. Does what it's supposed to. ...
customer_reviews.text: No tools needs. Does what it's supposed to. Get it before you need it - not after. Meaning, if you have an upcoming surgery (hip/knee replacement) get this product prior to your surgery date. Install it and get use to it in advance. And keep it clean people. Run some 409/Lysol over this with a rag or towels once in a while.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: The extra help I needed when recovering from a broken foot
customer_reviews.text: Used this seat when I broke my foot. At first I used both handles, but as I weened off the crutches I was able to remove both handles until I felt comfortable to be back to a standard toilet height (why aren’t toilets higher to begin with?)
customer_reviews.author: LD

customer_reviews.title: Remove the handles and check tightness.
customer_reviews.text: I is good if you remove the handles. Still using it. With the handles it is impossible to clean yourself. There is also a gap between the seat and toilet. It you are a man and have to sit to urinate it get on the floor. Great height. Made my life easier after hip replacement.
customer_reviews.author: oriynn

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work out so well...
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived without all the parts needed for installation. Customer service was unhelpful. Perhaps others have had a better experience.
customer_reviews.author: Blackrose Press

customer_reviews.title: It fits nicely.
customer_reviews.text: Since I will be having knee replacement surgery soon, this product will definitely be of help during my recovery. It fits nicely and is very sturdy with no wobbles. Thank you for an excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy fm TN

customer_reviews.title: Whoever made this design is not thinking clearly. If ...
customer_reviews.text: Whoever made this design is not thinking clearly. If a man, my patient, has to urinate when sitting on it the urine can run right out of the front of it if the person isn't careful. Returned it and bought him a raised toilet!
customer_reviews.author: Gabbie

customer_reviews.title: Plastic screw stripped after tightening it about 4 times
customer_reviews.text: I am upset about the plastic screw for tightening it on the toilet failed after moving the toilet seat about 4 times. Love the product, just not the plastic screw used for tightening it onto the toilet
customer_reviews.author: Two cents

customer_reviews.title: A Good Seat
customer_reviews.text: The seat is wide enough and generally very good. My only quibble is that the front indentation isn't deep enough.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: This was Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This was very uncomfortable looking. I could not imagine sitting on this seat. As soon as I took it out of the box and felt how hard it was it went right back in and was sent back.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter and Malibu's Mom

customer_reviews.title: I wasn't planning on liking this seat but it really ...
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't planning on liking this seat but it really has helped my husband get up after using. For me, it's really high and my feet are 6" up in the air but it fits him well and he is safer.
customer_reviews.author: Murphy

customer_reviews.title: I am tall so like the height
customer_reviews.text: I did fall off reaching for something. Sitting straight up and straight down with the use of the toilet, not the seat ( sitting down) now has me safe. I am tall so like the height, but DO NOT LEAN over!
customer_reviews.author: Terri Davis

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it if you don't need side handles. Buy a Nova riser instead.
customer_reviews.text: Would not lock correctly on the back of the toilet. Had to remove some plastic to obtain a better ledge. Pulling up on the front also caused it to come loose. This happened if you lifted up on one handle, but not if you lifted up on both handles equally.
customer_reviews.author: DENNIS ZIEGLER

customer_reviews.title: Good riser..no issues.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for my elderly mother in-law while she was recovering from a fractured tibia and was wheelchair-bound. Weve been using it for a couple of weeks now, with no issues. I definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: GeminiLAP12

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Mom who is 96 and in a memory care facility and she loves it! It makes it much easier to transfer from her wheelchair onto the toilet...and is much safer!
customer_reviews.author: PKRandle

customer_reviews.title: Wish the front genitalia area, was a little more ...
customer_reviews.text: Wish the front genitalia area, was a little more roomy, but served the purpose, while healing, from my bi-lateral knee surgery.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry L. Curtis Jr.

customer_reviews.title: A very good product and something that I truly needed after a ...
customer_reviews.text: A very good product and something that I truly needed after a hip replacement. Like the way that it is very easy to take off and pt on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Husband had a total knee replacement and this is ...
customer_reviews.text: My Husband had a total knee replacement and this is the most helpful aide for his on going recovery.
customer_reviews.author: Book girl

customer_reviews.title: ... support I needed it for a knee replacement surgery Easy to put on the toilet seat and it fit ...
customer_reviews.text: It definitely help with support I needed it for a knee replacement surgery Easy to put on the toilet seat and it fit as it was described
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is great!
customer_reviews.text: I got this fir for my mom. Easy to install and easy to use. She loves it.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It just didn't fit right and family member bought another one that worked well

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: Buy this item for my mom after her ned surgery is excellent
customer_reviews.author: yessica Olm

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: exactly what we needed for my husband with bone cancer
customer_reviews.author: Jude

customer_reviews.title: Good height
customer_reviews.text: Liked the height. Handles prevent proper wiping for my wide body. I will take them off.
customer_reviews.author: mixed media

customer_reviews.title: So easy. Fit elongated toilet well
customer_reviews.text: I have an ankle injury and am wearing a boot. It was really difficult to get up from my toilet seat, so I purchased this and it's a lifesaver. So easy. Fit elongated toilet well. Easy on and off for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: Mother loves it!
customer_reviews.text: It is for my mother and she is happy. So what more can be said if mom is happy.
customer_reviews.author: Teheara

customer_reviews.title: Fastens securely and installs easily
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install, extremely secure and functional. I bought this for my mom. She was having trouble with a bad knee and her existing low toilet seat. This seat really makes it easier to get up. The bars are helpful too.
customer_reviews.author: DLP

customer_reviews.title: It will be very easy to take of to clean
customer_reviews.text: The order arrived on time. My husband installed it in just a few minutes. It is exactly what he needed to help him stand up. It will be very easy to take of to clean.
customer_reviews.author: rita m

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we needed. Installed in seconds and fit perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Smith

customer_reviews.title: She is very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Got for an older relative who had knee surgery. She is very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my mom who has trouble getting up on her own.
customer_reviews.author: beth verret

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product was for my elderly mom and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: REE

customer_reviews.title: Seats Great!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my Mom, who had Right Hip Replacement. So far, it is just right for her with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara H. P.

product_meta.title: Medical Elevated Toilet Seat Riser, Independence ProBasics Commode Raised Toilet Seat with Arms and Lock
feature_bullets: WIDE & COMFORTABLE RAISER - Unique ergonomic design adds 5" of height extension to your toilet seat to make it easier to sit down or get up from the toilet. Our premium elderly assistant toilet seat riser is intended for individuals that might be handicapped or disabled, experience limited mobility in daily activities, may be pregnant or seniors with bending or sitting difficulties.

SECURE & SAFE LIFT - Anti-slip surface, push pins and locking mechanism ensure a secure fit on the toilet bowl rim. Removable padded grab bar handrail handles ensure a comfortable grip and seamless edges provide a better sitting experience to maximize safety and security.

DURABLE & HYGIENIC - Reliable ADA complaint toilet seat height extender and high quality raised toilet booster seat is anti-bacterial and made with heavy-duty molded premium plastic construction that guarantees frequent long lasting use.

LIGHTWEIGHT & PORTABLE - Weighs less than 5lbs. Easy to store or to travel with for added convenience. Contoured seat is designed with a wider size surface for added comfort, stability and peace of mind while taking care of personal necessities in the bathroom.

EASY INSTALLATION AND CLEANING. Adjustable toilet seat lifter offers a tool-free installation and universal fit on most standard toilets (16.5") and elongated toilets (18.5"). Simply remove existing toilet seat, place flat against toilet bowl, and tighten until secure! Easy to clean and wipe to sterilize. Product dimensions: 16.5" (D) x 17" (W) x 5" (H).
